items.name: Black Forest Cake
items.description:
8" 2 or 3 tiered moist chocolate cake layered with vanilla cream and cherries.
Topped with Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate ganache.

items.name: Passionfruit White Chocolate Cake
items.description: 8" 2 or 3 tiered vanilla cake filled with passonfruit curd and covered in Whittakers White Chocolate ganache.

items.name: Hummingbird Cake
items.description: 8" 2 tiered hummingbird cake - cinnamon, bananas, pineapple, crunchy pecans and a cream cheese frosting.

items.name: Lolly Cake
items.description: 9" Kiwi classic lolly cake - Crushed Malt biscuits, condensed milk, butter and Explorers lollies.

items.name: Apple, Date and Walnut Cake
items.description: 9" ring pan, apple, date and walnut cake topped with a crunchy walnut topping.

items.name: Coffee and Walnut Cake
items.description: 8" 2 tiered coffee cake layered with a white chocolate and coffee whipped ganache and walnuts.

items.name: German Chocolate Cake
items.description: 8" 2 tiered chocolate cake layered with a coconut and pecan frosting and chocolate frosting.

items.name: Pinkie Cake
items.description: 8" 3 tiered pink raspberry cake with layers of pink compote (rhubarb, strawberry and raspberry). Covered with a raspberry buttercream and sprinkles.

items.name: Banoffee Cake
items.description: 8" 2 tiered banana cake layered with dulce de leche, bananas and a dulce de leche buttercream.

items.name: Dark Chocolate Orange Cake
items.description: 8" 2 tiered chocolate cake filled with an orange chocolate chip buttercream. Topped with Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate ganache.

items.name: Carrot Cake Cheesecake
items.description: 9" nutty and spiced carrot cake swirled with creamy cheesecake.

items.name: Biscoff Cheesecake
items.description: 9" no bake cheesecake with a Biscoff filling and topping.

items.name: Biscoff Brownie
items.description: 9" chocolate brownie with a Biscoff filling and topping.

items.name: Hazelnut Brownie
items.description: 9" chocolate brownie with a nutella filling and topping, sprinkled with Ferrero Rochers.

items.name: Peanut Butter Brownie
items.description: 9" chocolate brownie with Reese's Pieces, swirled with Pics peanut butter.

items.name: Mint Chocolate Brownie
items.description: 9" chocolate brownie with Aero Mint Chocolate and topped with Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana Chocolate and crumbled Aero Mint Chocolate.

items.name: Oreo Brownie
items.description: 9" chocolate brownie with Oreos in the filling and on top.

items.name: Strawberry Chocolate Brownie
items.description: 9" chocolate brownie with Aero Strawberry Chocolate and topped with Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana Chocolate and crumbled Aero Strawberry Chocolate.

items.name: Chocolate Strawberry Biscuits
items.description: Indulgent milk chocolate and freeze dried strawberry biscuits.

items.name: Dark Chocolate Ginger Biscuits
items.description: Chunks of crystallised ginger and Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate.

items.name: Dark Chocolate Ganache Biscuits
items.description: Chocolate biscuits with a Whittakers 72% Dark Ghana chocolate ganache center.

items.name: Nutella M&M Biscuits
items.description: Nutella filled biscuits, topped with M&Ms.

items.name: Biscoff Biscuits
items.description: Biscuits filled and topped with Biscoff.

items.name: KitKat Biscuits
items.description: Chocolate biscuits with KitKats inside and on top.

items.name: Peanut Butter Biscuits
items.description: Chocolate biscuits with a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup inside and topped with drizzled Pic's Peanut Butter.

items.name: Cookie Monster Biscuits
items.description: Biscuits with white chocolate, milk chocolate, mini Oreos and Cookie Time Cookie Bites inside and on top.
